itemDescription: British diplomat and civil servant; Governor of Montserrat

wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Anne Carriere  is a former British civil servant working in international development. From 2015 to 2018, she served as Governor of Montserrat.

response: * Elizabeth Carriere, Governor of Montserrat from 2015 to 2018

In March 2010, he was appointed Governor of Montserrat, replacing Peter Waterworth who was retiring from the diplomatic service. Davis was sworn in as Governor on 8 April 2011.New Governor sworn into office, Antigua Observer, 11 April 2011. His term as Governor ended on 8 July 2015. Elizabeth Carriere was sworn in as his replacement on 5 August.http://zjb.gov.ms/2015/07/07/news-for-tuesday-july-7-2015/

response: In December 2017, the FCO announced that Pearce would succeed Elizabeth Carriere as Governor of Montserrat in February 2018.
Lyndell Simpson is a Montserratian who is the Deputy Governor of Montserrat in 2018. She succeeded Elizabeth Carriere, who held the position since 2015, and was succeeded by Andrew Pearce.
